about_the_game:
Glass Heart

S-kape’s first album “Glass” is armed to the max with adorable sexiness!

This full-length official first album, containing the single "Song of Youthful Instinct," will be released through the game “Glass.”

Ridge, who became known through the game’s OST, has teamed up with Roxy, Siah, and Arruy to form the group
“S-kape” and is now presenting us with their first album!

The group is ready to captivate gamer’s hearts with an album filled with adorable, cute, fresh, and lovely music,
and each member will show off their unique charm with solo performances.

This album contains a total of eight songs, which includes the theme songs of six characters from the game -
Renky, Iris, Rena, Cerestina, Michell and Eily - and the game’s two main theme songs.

The songs are of various genres, ranging from jazz blues to rock and K-pop, to match each game character's unique charm.
The music has been carefully crafted to capture the adorable, affectionate, sexy, powerful, and soulful appeal of the game.

Now, are you ready to meet the newest girl group “S-kape”?
Enter the game of “Glass” to find out!

Directed by 月天先生
Lyrics by Thin Silk, AJ10
Composed by AJ10
Arranged by AJ10
Keyboard Chulsoo Kim
Guitar Kun M
Bass CH-nerdy
Percussion Rhythmuch
String Team Shake
Chous Roxy, Siah, Arruy, Ridge
Mix Salon de Moonlight


* This DLC was made to prepare for the development of glass 2. Please give us lots of support.
